reviewText: I was so disappointed with this dvd.

I am certain our husbands would love any of these moves we could pick up, but you would have to be pretty thin to pull it off.it is pretty much showing how to grind yourself into him in every way. If you can do it, your husband will be a happy man.

If I had any talent, whatsoever, this would have been a great learning tool. But I move about as sexy as a twig being jerked about in a violent storm lol. I will say, however, the young lady, in the video, have the skills for both dancing and teaching. She takes everything nice and slow, walks through it step by step, taking time to really focus on the how to' and not to of each move. Everything is presented in a professional and classy, yet slightly sexy, manner, If you already dance better than the standard cut of 2x4 wood...you can do this!
I already knew rip and hip isolation from belly dancing but overall I love this video. She does everything nice and slow so can learn the moves.
This video is really good for people who are uncoordinated and can't dance.  I do wish she showed a few more moves, but the video goes through it slow and gives you time to practice.
